geonomics.utils package¶

Submodules¶

geonomics.utils.io module¶

Module name: utils.io

Module contains:

  • basic IO functions

Author: Drew Ellison Hart Email: drew.hart@berkeley.edu Github: URL Start date: 07-18-18 Documentation: URL

geonomics.utils.spatial module¶

Module name: utils.spatial

Module contains:

  • general-use spatial classes and functions, for use in a variety of operations

Author: Drew Ellison Hart Email: drew.hart@berkeley.edu Github: URL Start date: 07-04-18 Documentation: URL

geonomics.utils.viz module¶

Module name: utils.viz

Module contains:

  • basic visualization functions, to be inherited by classes of model components

Author: Drew Ellison Hart Email: drew.hart@berkeley.edu Github: URL Start date: 06-18-18 Documentation: URL
